name: Likes System and Social Share Buttons for WordPress and WooCommerce
author: Conic Solutions

sections.description:
Standalone likes system and social share buttons for your website. Custom post types are supported! Working with WooCommerce as well. Something NEW for WordPress websites!
Smart likes system, completely customizable + social share buttons.
Get more interactions with your visitors!

WooCommerce is supported in PRO version.

Video

DEMO

Features

  • Very easy to integrate and use
  • You will get more interactions with your visitors
  • Visitors don’t need to be registered, they can put a thumb up as guests
  • Custom post types are supported
  • Working with WooCommerce as well
  • Possibility to show on archive/category pages
  • Build your likes and social buttons with Font Awesome, your custom images or our defined images

Documentation

Here you can read all about Likes System and Social Share Buttons plugin
DOCUMENTATION
